sentences.en: Conclusion Mumps and DT vaccines can be administered simultaneously.
sentences.cn: 结论两苗是可以同时接种的.

sentences.en: How do I know which mumps vaccine I or my child should be vaccinated with?
sentences.cn: 如何知道我或我的孩子该接种何种流行性腮腺炎疫苗？

sentences.en: I was told not go near Charles. He is sickening for mumps.
sentences.cn: 别人告诉我不要走近查尔斯, 他染上了流行性腮腺炎.

sentences.en: Measles, mumps and influenza are common diseases.
sentences.cn: 麻疹, 腮腺炎和流感是常见病.

sentences.en: Measles, mumps and whooping cough are spreading again because children are not being vaccinated.
sentences.cn: 因为孩子们没接种疫苗，麻疹、腮腺炎和百日咳又蔓延开来。
腮腺炎是一种儿童疾病.

sentences.en: Mumps is an acute contagious viral infection.
sentences.cn: 腮腺炎是一种急性接触性病毒传染.

sentences.en: Mumps makes the glands in your neck swell up.
sentences.cn: 腮腺炎使你颈部的淋巴腺肿胀.

sentences.en: Mumps virus can be isolated from saliva, urine, and, in meningitis, from the cerebrospianal fluid.
sentences.cn: 流腮病毒可自唾液及尿中分离出来, 患脑膜炎时, 病毒则可来自脑脊髓液.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the molecular characteristics of mumps virus in Tangshan city.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨唐山市流行性腮腺炎病毒的分子特征.

sentences.en: Our youngest boy has gone down with mumps.
sentences.cn: 我们的小儿子得了腮腺炎.

sentences.en: Poor Dick has gone down with mumps.
sentences.cn: 可怜的迪克得了流行性腮腺炎.

sentences.en: Sarah got mumps from her brother.
sentences.cn: 萨拉的弟弟患腮腺炎,传染给她了.

sentences.en: She was bed - ridden with the mumps for weeks on end.
sentences.cn: 因为腮腺炎她接连卧床好几星期.

sentences.en: The most common cause of a total irreversible unilateral loss of hearing is mumps.
sentences.cn: 完全不可逆的一侧听力丧失的最常见原因是流行性腮腺炎.

words.tran_cn: [内科]流行性腮腺炎；愠怒；生气

trans.tran_en: an infectious illness which makes your neck swell and become painful
